Create NocoDB base

Source: R/rdb.gen.R
create_ncdb_base.Rd

Adds a new base on the RDB NocoDB server via the POST /api/v2/meta/bases API endpoint.

Usage

create_ncdb_base(
  title = ncdb_base_name,
  description = NULL,
  color = color_rdb_main,
  show_null_and_empty_in_filter = TRUE,
  auth_token = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "ncdb_token", pkg = this_pkg)
)

Arguments

title

Title of the new base. A character scalar.

description

Description of the new base. A character scalar.

color

Color to use for the base icon. A hexadecimal color code like "#3f4eff".

show_null_and_empty_in_filter

Whether or not to distinguish NULLs from empty values in column filters. If FALSE, NULL and empty fields are treated alike.

auth_token

NocoDB API authentication token. A character scalar.

Value

A tibble containing metadata about the newly created NocoDB base.

See also

Other NocoDB API functions config_ncdb(), create_ncdb_user(), ncdb_api(), ncdb_base(), ncdb_base_id(), ncdb_bases(), ncdb_tbl(), ncdb_tbl_col(), ncdb_tbl_col_id(), ncdb_tbl_cols(), ncdb_tbl_id(), ncdb_tbls(), ncdb_users(), reorder_ncdb_tbl(), set_ncdb_display_val(), set_ncdb_display_vals(), set_ncdb_tbl_metadata(), update_ncdb_base(), update_ncdb_tbl(), update_ncdb_tbl_col(), upload_ncdb_attachments()
